title: Loops
message:
Loops allow you to execute a block of code as many times as needed
For in loop allows you to use the key to get the value in an Object
must use array syntax when dynamically accessing elements in an object

The while loop must state a condition that while it is true will still enable it to continue to execute the block of code
Also while loops need a break out otherwise the could end up going on forever so in order to break out you must add a count variable
